programme.title: The Simpsons 29 - EP 8

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 - EP 13
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 132
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 6
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 5
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.desc: Raksasa tells the story of Maryanne Salihin Heng, a single parent raising her rebellious 12 year old daughter, Lily. Maryanne is long estranged from her father Salihin Heng, and would not want anything to do with him. If it's not for Lily's penchant to run to Salihin's kelong every time they have a fight, Maryanne would never have to see her father again. But when Lily is taken by Raksana (monster) at Salihin's kelong one night, Maryanne can't help but to blame her father for losing her child.

There are many folk remedies to treat and relieve various common eye problems. programme.title: 心。愿 The Wish - EP 1
programme.desc: A motorbike accident robbed aircraft engineer Tan Hong Lian of his mobility, but not his spirit. Now in a nursing home, he finds solace in gardening and grooming its plants. Can The Wish team grow his green passion into a greater oasis? 一场摩托车事故夺走了飞机工程师陈鸿亮的一只手中的工能，使他不能工作；但这却没有夺走他的干劲。 他现在在养老院里，并在园艺和修饰植物方面找到了慰藉。 他的愿望是为居民做更多的事，并与他们分享他的爱心和手工。”聚爱圆梦”团队能否将他的绿色激情变成更大的绿洲？.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 7

programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Italy's Sant' Angelo del Lombardi Prison is a model prison. 80% of their prisoners are getting a paid job here. Those who keep good conduct are allowed to work outside. Each year the prison receives 30-40 transfer requests. There are criminals turning themselves in asking to serve their term here. (重)意大利圣安杰洛监狱是一所模范监狱，透过改造计划，百分之八十的囚犯获得受薪工作，表现特优者还能外出工作，作息不受监督。这所监狱每年接获30至40个调迁申请，还有罪犯自己找上门，要求在这里服刑。.

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The Philippines has the biggest Japanese community in Southeast Asia, with many arriving in the early 19th century. They bore the wrath of the locals after WWII, though this has dissipated through the years. Still, many have mixed feelings on their identity. Where do they truly belong? (重)19世纪初日本劳工的涌入，促使菲律宾达沃的麻蕉出口蓬勃发展，并成功蜕变成菲律宾最早现代化的城市之一。而菲律宾也是东南亚住有最多日本人的国家。多年以来，许多生活在菲律宾的日本后裔总是面对一种矛盾，他们是日本人，而菲律宾却是他们成长的地方，他们该如何自处？何去何从？上一代日本后裔背负着战争的枷锁，饱受主流社会的仇视，而新一代的日本后裔虽然没有了战争的包袱，却仍然必须在破碎的家庭中成长。这一集节目探讨生活在菲律宾的日本后裔的故事。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) One of China's greatest classical novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber" details the life and food of noble families. Host Danny Yeo visits Shanghai and Yangzhou to find a sumptuous feast inspired by this literature. (重)《红楼梦》可说是中国古代社会的一本百科全书，详细地描绘了当时贵族家庭的日常生活，也有许多关于美食的描述。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循古代名著的撰写，走访扬州与上海，寻找依据文字拼贴而出的一桌珍馐美味。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 30
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Daoxi sneaks into the mental institution to look for Na-yan. Once they meet up with each other, Daoxi exchanges attire with Na-yan and asks her to leave immediately. Moments later, a patient sets fire to the institution. Na-yan heads back to look for Daoxi, but Daoxi perishes due to her weak heart. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道希得知娜妍被关在精神病院里，于是潜进精神病院找娜妍。两姐妹相认后，道希跟娜妍对换衣服，并要娜妍赶到新星的身边去。不久后，有一病患在院内放火，本来已经离开医院的娜妍回头找道希，但道希心脏不好，在病房内逝世。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 16
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Haiying texts her cousin who will be getting married the next day in a family chat group and Haiying wants to catch the bouquet. programme.desc: SAGA S2 picks up the story of the two antagonists from the first installation, Zack and Ryan. The action-packed story is laces with vengeful dark secrets, betrayals and revenge. Zack, a strong-willled ex-convict who is determined to mend his past, goes head-on against his Silat Master father, Borhan. Behind Borhan's back, Zack seeks refuge in Borhan's nemesis, Ryan, who encourages him to explore his deep interest in Mix Martial Arts. Zack finds out he is merely a pawn in Ryan’s mission to pay off his debt to Rio. Sofea witnesses an unconscious Borhan being handled by Farouk and informs Zack. Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. Ryan is pleased and confident the injury will cause Zack to lose an important MMA match, which he had placed a huge bet on the contender.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina makes her way to Phnom Penh, where the villagers live simply in ramshackle houses without water or electricity. Together with fellow volunteer, Fazli, she soon discovers that simple innovations and recycling methods can improve their living conditions bit by bit. She collects unused and half-used soap bars from hotel customers, and brings it over to an organisation that recycle them into new soap bars for the villagers. She also discovers how a simple pet bottle, water and a bit of bleach put through the zinc roofs of the houses can shine as brightly as any electrical bulb. Finally she joins some school children, whom she is impressed by how fast they pick up singing and dancing, and even paint a new mural for their school.

programme.title: Nota Dari Hati
programme.desc: Memaparkan dokumentasi visual perjalanan Orkestra RTM sepanjang 59 tahun kewujudannya. Muzik yang mereka mainkan bertaraf dunia dan jenama yang terbina ini telah dikenali serata dunia. Menampilkan tokoh - tokoh penting dan mereka yang berada di sebalik tabir. Penonton akan dapat mengikuti rutin persiapan yang perlu dijalani ketika penerbitan sesuatu konsert orkestra berlangsung. Penonton turut dihiburkan dengan klip - klip video istimewa persembahan Orkestra RTM.

programme.title: Final Preparations
programme.desc: With just 16 days left until The Baja 1000, the teams go through their numerous final preparations. With the start of the Baja 1000 just 16 days away, the teams go through their numerous final preparations. Race qualification, equipment readiness, sponsorship deals, must all be taken care of, not to mention time for mental preparation.

programme.title: Living Forever
programme.desc: American rapper GZA is on a quest to understand the age-old human desire to live forever. In his quest to understand the human desire to live forever, American rapper GZA finds out how bodies are stored in Arizona, visits a California lab studying the immortal hydra, and goes to Vermont’s transhumanist Terasem Foundation.

programme.title: Orlando von Einsiedel
programme.desc: See how film director Orlando von Einsiedel travelled the world to make Oscar-nominated documentaries. Learn how snowboarding took British film director Orlando von Einsiedel from dry slopes in London to going around the world to make several Oscar-nominated documentaries, and eventually to winning an Oscar himself.

programme.title: Danny Larsen
programme.desc: Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist. Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist – and what lesson he learned from snowboarding to dare the leap into creative arts.

programme.title: Eva Sandelgard
programme.desc: The Swedish freerider talks about the thrills of extreme snowboarding and dressing hair at Paris Fashion Week. Swedish Eve Sandelgard is a triple extreme snowboarding world champion and an haute couture hairdresser. Hear the story of her double life, from first female descents down Mont Blanc, France and Denali (Mt McKinley), Alaska to Paris Fashion Week.

programme.title: 24 hours with Kiddy Smile
programme.desc: With the release of his debut album, One Trick Pony, Kiddy Smile is set to take centre stage. Kiddy Smile is first and foremost a one-of-a-kind character. The performer plays around with his musical and physical identities, mixing genres and influences. With the release of his debut album, One Trick Pony, Kiddy is set to take centre stage.

programme.title: 4 Waves 1 Hour
programme.sub-title: The story of Mick Fanning's 2013 ASP title
programme.desc: A battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. The 2013 ASP World Championship was a battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning that all came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. Mick's journey to the title is narrated by the man himself in an intimate and dramatic look at his win.

programme.title: The Fog
programme.desc: Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody cross the salt flats into the heavy fog of Guerrero Negro, Mexico. After waking up in the gorgeous Scorpion Bay, Mexico, with some relaxing paddle boarding, Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody head through the salt flats to the lush oasis of San Ignacio, Belize, then into the deep fog of Guerrero Negro, Mexico.

programme.title: We Live It, Love It, and Pin It!
programme.desc: Leaving the foggy coast behind, Quinn Cody and Kendall Norman head into the Baja interior to ride sand dunes. Quinn Cody and Kendall Norman leave the foggy coast and head north into the hot and dry Baja interior, tearing up some sand dunes along the way. After navigating a dangerous route, the duo returns to the original roadside market where the trip began.

programme.title: Back to Business
programme.desc: Kendall Norman’s and Quinn Cody's epic adventure wraps up in time for them to defend their Baja 1000 titles. As their epic journey comes to a close, it's time for Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody to get back to business. The task at hand: defending their champion status in the legendary Baja 1000, a 1,000-mile nonstop race across the Baja California peninsula.

programme.title: Depth Perception
programme.desc: Snowboarder Travis Rice and friends ponder the personal connection between rider and Nature. Travis Rice returns to the roots of snowboarding in his latest brainchild as he and fellow riders head to British Columbia’s temperate forest, the furthest inland rainforest in the world, and show the unique connection each rider shares with nature.

programme.title: Days of My Youth
programme.desc: Matchstick Productions' two-year project follows top skiers around the world chasing what they love: snow. The feeling of eternal youth that skiers get from doing what they love is the central theme of this two-year project from Matchstick Productions. Starring some of the most progressive skiers, this film shows the trials and triumphs of being the best.

programme.title: Control Your Gear
programme.desc: Andrew Cotton talks about the most controllable variable when surfing big waves: the equipment. When chasing huge waves, most of the variables are beyond the surfer's control. Andrew Cotton talks about controlling what he can with his equipment and the safety procedures he uses when he surfs.

programme.title: Tracking Giants
programme.desc: Getting big waves means being in the right place at the right time. Andrew tracks a big swell to Portugal. The science behind tracking waves is a complex process. Andrew Cotton relies on surf forecasters and weather data to predict where and when the biggest swells are hitting. When one heads towards Portugal, he jams to Nazaré to be there when it hits.

programme.title: Dolomites Descent
programme.desc: Go with Richie Schley as he lives a mountain biker's dream by riding the Dolomites from top to bottom. Richie Schley lives a mountain biker's dream by riding Italy's Dolomites from top to bottom. Take the trip with Richie as he tackles the sheer and austere limestone of the peaks and rips through the forests below the tree line in a ride for the ages.

programme.title: Tempo Storm takes a leap of faith
programme.desc: Red Bull cliff diver David Colturi teaches Hearthstone team members to cliff dive. Like cliff diving, the game Hearthstone is all about calculating risk. Watch as Red Bull cliff diver David Colturi teaches Hearthstone’s Tempo Storm team members Frodan and Reynad to face their nerves and perform a cliff dive.

programme.title: Snake Eyez conquers his fears – and the falls
programme.desc: Street Fighter player Snake Eyez learns about watersports from pro kayaker Rafa Ortiz. Top of his game, Street Fighter player Snake Eyez heads out on the river with kayaker Rafa Ortiz and learns the fundamentals of kayaking.

programme.title: Teams with Dreams
programme.desc: Meet five teams preparing for the Baja 1000 and learn what motivates each to enter off-roading's crown jewel. A pro racer, a hometown hero, a husband-and-wife team, a pair of sisters, and a total novice – meet five diverse teams preparing for the Baja 1000. They all have different motivations but only one goal: to try to win off-road racing's crown jewel.

programme.title: TJ Rogers
programme.desc: From foster care to a first-class skateboarder, TJ Rogers heads home to retrace his turbulent formative years. Now a world-travelling skateboarder, TJ Rogers didn't always have it so easy. TJ returns to his hometown of Whitby, Canada, to visit the people and places that shaped his life during his troubled and turbulent formative years.

programme.title: Torey Pudwill
programme.desc: Roll along with us as we chill with Grizzly Griptape and Thank You Skateboards' very own Torey Pudwill. Roll along with us as we chill with Grizzly Griptape and Thank You Skateboards' very own Torey Pudwill for a day in Woodland Hills, California.
